definitions.text: the aggregation of things (pedestrians or vehicles) coming and going in a particular locality during a specified period of time
buying and selling; especially illicit trade
the amount of activity over a communication system during a given period of time
examples: heavy traffic overloaded the trunk lines
traffic on the internet is lightest during the night

definitions.text: social or verbal interchange (usually followed by `with')

examples: They trafficked with us for gold
